name: The Last Catch
description:
Fly Like a Fishman

Dangerous forces have their sights set on this Fishman. Fly from your pursuers to make a daring escape!

Entry for One Game A Month Jam 6
  • Manti - Code, Music, Audio
  • Knightleaf - Modelling, Animation, Code

Scenery and pickup models from Kenney's Platformer Kit

Controls
  • WASD - move
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Ctrl - knock over objects
